ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules

Class CheckLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.Rule
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules.CheckLanguage

  • public class CheckLanguage
extends Rule

    Checks the text for spelling, grammar and style errors. This rule is a wrapper around the Language Tool Java library, which does all the work.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CheckLanguage.CheckLanguageSpecific

      Whether to disable Language Tool’s “whitespace rule”.

      The language tool object used to check the language

    • Field Detail

      • m_languageTool

        protected org.languagetool.JLanguageTool m_languageTool

        The language tool object used to check the language

      • m_dictionary

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> m_dictionary

        A list of words that should be ignored by spell checking

      • m_disableWhitespace

        protected boolean m_disableWhitespace

        Whether to disable Language Tool’s “whitespace rule”. Since the detexed string may contain extra spaces (due to the removal of markup), and that LaTeX ignores multiple spaces anyway, it is advisable to turn it off.

      • m_disableUnpaired

        protected boolean m_disableUnpaired

        Whether to disable Language Tool’s “unpaired symbol” rule. The detexing of the string leaves a few unmatched “}”, so we just ignore this rule when it concerns this particular character.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckLanguage

        public CheckLanguage(org.languagetool.Language lang,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> dictionary)
              throws CheckLanguage.UnsupportedLanguageException

        Creates a new rule for checking a specific language

        Parameters:
        lang - The language to check. If null, the constructor will throw an exception
        dictionary - A set of words that should be ignored by spell checking
        Throws:
        CheckLanguage.UnsupportedLanguageException - If lang is null
